subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Nadal, the 2013 United States Open champion, said that his right wrist, injured in a practice on Tuesday, needed to be immobilized for at least two or three weeks.
snippet: Nadal, the 2013 United States Open champion, said that his right wrist, injured in a practice on Tuesday, needed to be immobilized for at least two or three weeks.
